product_name: Seattle Sports Camp Towel - Medium - 2012 Special Buy
long_description: The Seattle Sports medium camp towel is super absorbent, super lightweight and dries super quick. 30" x 10" size is handy for camping, boating or backpacking. Microfiber material soaks up water 10 times its own weight and then wrings out 85% dry, ready to absorb again. Compact towel is great for a variety of uses from camping and boating to cleaning up bikes, motorcycles and cars. Seattle Sports camp towel is not color fast-wash before using. Special buy.
short_description: The Seattle Sports medium camp towel is super absorbent, super lightweight and dries super quick. 30" x 10" size is handy for camping, boating or backpacking.
